title: One Piece Episode 235 is more iconic that it gets credit for, here's why
author: Sportskeeda Editorial
description: An analysis of why Episode 235 is underrated compared to Episode 236, explaining how it masterfully builds the conflict between Luffy and Usopp and marks the first internal conflict the crew had engaged in.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about the Water 7 arc and Usopp's eventual return

title: 235: Big Fight Under the Moon! The Pirate Flag Flutters with Sorrow!
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: First-time viewer's thoughts on Episode 235, praising it as one of the best examples of good-guys-have-to-fight-each-other storytelling, noting that neither Luffy nor Usopp is wrong in their position.
